alert.note: Alert for Cloud; Republic (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 12:21AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Republic and north central Cloud Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1221 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Norway, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belleville, Scandia and Norway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
